reviewText: one of the best movies was weekend at bernie's laughed so hard the others were very good also miss  the 80's

Clearly a classic for all time, Weekend at Bernie's is a gem I had forgotten about.  This leads the pack with undeniable hilarity and the fantasy of two regular joes trying to get rich.  The other movies are good, but Party Animal is creepily forgettable.  I didn't like that guy, the music was ok, but easily the lowest of the four.  Hot Dog: the movie is more cheese with some impressive Shannon Tweed footage, Meatballs 4 was the worst of the four IMHO.
Received as expected in great condition.

Let me say I would have given this box set a two star rating, if Hot Dog...the movie wasn't in this set. The good thing about this set, is that the Hot Dog movie is cheaper in this set than on it's own.
Bought this so I can watch Hotdog and relive my teenage years with Shannon Tweed.

Man over board.  Lol. Great
Movie. Even the kids love it.
A great bunch of funny old you but goodies. Hot Dog The Movie is hilarious especially the final scene!!!
four movies one price how can you go wrong you can't it is great and fun to watch
Hilarious four pack of cinematography. Great speed in getting the item and outstanding overall service. Keep up the good work as you have us crying tears of joy!
